en: Today's school does no poorer a job than it used to.
zh: 现在的学校办得不比以前差。

en: You're looking snappy today.
zh: 你今天穿得真精神。

en: At today's meeting almost everybody backed my plan.
zh: 在今天的会上，几乎所有人都支持我的计划。

en: I put in a good word for my friend at today's meeting.
zh: 我在今天的会上帮我朋友说了几句好话。

en: I am not satisfied with my performance today.
zh: 我对今天自己的表现不太满意。

en: What is the exchange rate today?
zh: 今天的汇率是多少？

en: What's the exchange rate today?
zh: 今天的汇率是多少？

en: Today's rate is 140 yen to the dollar.
zh: 今天的汇率是一美元兑140日元。

en: People will fry to a crisp in the sun today.
zh: 今天太阳要把人晒焦了。

en: I hope today's ball game won't be canceled.
zh: 我希望今天的球赛不会被取消。

en: Today's party is informal.
zh: 今天的派对很随意。

en: Who was in charge of today's party?
zh: 今天的派对是谁负责的？

en: Today's party was really lively, wasn't it?
zh: 今天的派对真热闹，不是吗？

en: Germany of today is not what it was ten years ago.
zh: 现在的德国已经不是十年前的样子了。

en: Which would you like?
zh: 你想要哪一个？

en: At lunchtime today, our usual restaurant was closed because of a funeral in the family.
zh: 今天午饭时间，我们经常去的那家餐馆因为家里办丧事关门了。

en: I lost my notebook today.
zh: 我今天把笔记本弄丢了。

en: What is today's recommendation?
zh: 今天的推荐菜是什么？

en: You're very stylish today.
zh: 你今天穿得很时髦。

en: I owe what I am solely to both my parents.
zh: 我能有今天，全靠我父母。

en: Who's the D. J. today?
zh: 今天的DJ是谁？

en: Today's performance of the ABC Symphony Orchestra fell short of my expectations.
zh: ABC交响乐团今天的表现没达到我的预期。

en: Only today did I know the details of the matter.
zh: 我直到今天才知道这件事的细节。

en: You can come and get it today.
zh: 你今天就能过来拿。

en: Where are you having lunch today?
zh: 你今天在哪儿吃午饭？

en: Nowadays, there are still a few groups of people in different parts of the world who do not have permanent homes.
zh: 现如今，世界上一些地方仍有一些人没有固定的家。

en: Today, paper is used in quantity every day.
zh: 如今，纸张每天的使用量都很大。

en: Nowadays there is a close relationship between foreign relations and domestic affairs.
zh: 如今，外交关系和国内事务息息相关。

en: Today you can't be content with just earning a living.
zh: 现如今，你不能只满足于糊口。

en: It is not easy to be an umpire today.
zh: 现在当裁判可不容易。

en: Nowadays the young take no care of the old.
zh: 现在的年轻人都不怎么赡养老人了。

en: Cars are now available in a wide range of prices.
zh: 现在的汽车各种价位的都有。

en: Today, we can tell how the weather will be with a high degree of accuracy.
zh: 如今，我们可以非常准确地预测天气。

en: Nowadays freedom of speech is taken as a matter of course.
zh: 如今，言论自由被认为是理所当然的。

en: Nowadays, almost every home has one or two televisions.
zh: 现如今，几乎家家户户都有一两台电视。

en: Less students study German today than formerly.
zh: 如今学德语的学生比以前少了。

en: Today no one can imagine a life without television.
zh: 如今没人能想象没有电视的生活。

en: It is an advantage today to have a knowledge of computers.
zh: 在今天，懂电脑是一项优势。

en: Nowadays few people can afford to employ a maid.
zh: 如今很少有人请得起保姆了。

en: Nowadays there are railways all over England.
zh: 现在的英格兰到处都是铁路。

en: Nowadays many people live to be over seventy years old.
zh: 如今很多人都能活到七十多岁。

en: Today we have more than three times as many vehicles as on the roads in 1950.
zh: 现在的车辆总数是1950年的三倍多。

en: Today only 10 percent is covered.
zh: 现在只覆盖了百分之十。

en: Today she can do many things humans can do with language.
zh: 如今她能用语言做很多只有人类能做的事。

en: Nowadays, commuters take traffic jams for granted.
zh: 如今，上班族对堵车已经习以为常了。

en: Handmade goods are very expensive nowadays.
zh: 现如今，手工制品非常贵。

en: Today, through radio and television, mass advertising can reach millions of people at a time with its messages.
zh: 如今，通过广播和电视，大众广告可以一次向数百万人传递信息。

en: Today, more and more people are changing jobs in order to get a better salary and higher social status.
zh: 如今，越来越多的人为了更高的薪水和更好的社会地位而跳槽。

en: Today, you must have a photograph in your passport.
zh: 现在的护照上必须贴照片。

en: Today, even white-collar workers are confronted with great hardships.
zh: 现如今，连白领也面临着巨大的困难。

en: More and more women have their own careers and are economically independent of their husbands.
zh: 现在的女性越来越多都有自己的事业，经济上也不再依赖丈夫了。

en: Today, to send a telegram in the States to anywhere in the world, all you have to do is to give the message over the telephone.
zh: 现在在美国，想给世界各地发个电报，只要打个电话把内容报过去就行了。

en: This is the fifth consecutive day of decline of stock prices.
zh: 股价已经连续跌了五天了。

en: Today is the fifth day of continual stock price decline.
zh: 今天是股价连续下跌的第五天。

en: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
zh: 今天能做的事千万别拖到明天。

en: Today pilot fatigue seems more likely.
zh: 现在看来，飞行员疲劳驾驶的情况好像更容易发生。

en: Just for this once, let's not have an argument.
zh: 就这一次，咱们别吵了行吗？

en: I'll apply for the job today.
zh: 我今天要去申请那份工作。

en: I have a lot of assignments to do today.
zh: 我今天有好多作业要写。

en: There is a big movement today to recycle trash.
zh: 现在挺流行垃圾回收的。

en: This program is going to focus on computer hacking issues today.
zh: 今天的节目主要关注电脑黑客的问题。

en: I'll mail this letter today.
zh: 我今天会把这封信寄出去。

en: For a full day from today please.
zh: 请从今天起算一整天。

en: May I call on you today?
zh: 我今天能去拜访你吗？

en: I went to a musical with my favorite actor today. He's the one must-see for this year.
zh: 我今天去看了我最喜欢的那个演员演的音乐剧，他绝对是今年必看。

en: Today the ozone layer is thinning.
zh: 现在的臭氧层变薄了。

en: I'm sorry I wasn't able to see you when you came by today.
zh: 抱歉你今天过来的时候我没能见到你。

en: Are you busy today?
zh: 你今天忙吗？

en: Industry as we know it today didn't exist in those days.
zh: 那时候还没有我们现在这种工业。

en: I'm going to clean your bedroom today.
zh: 我今天打算打扫一下你的卧室。

en: I wish I could go with you today.
zh: 我要是今天能跟你一起去就好了。

en: I'm sorry I can't go with you today.
zh: 不好意思，我今天不能跟你一起去。

en: We've driven enough for one day.
zh: 咱们今天开得够久了。

en: We've run enough for one day.
zh: 咱们今天跑得够多了。

en: Today I walked 10 kilometers.
zh: 我今天走了10公里。

en: If you go to a baseball game today, sellers are walking around with hot-water tanks.
zh: 现在你要是去看棒球赛，会看到小贩背着热水壶走来走去。

en: He interviewed the suspect today.
zh: 他今天询问了嫌疑人。

en: It is regrettable that young Japanese today should show little interest in the traditional culture of their country.
zh: 现在的日本年轻人对国家的传统文化不太感兴趣，真挺遗憾的。

en: I'll look around the city today.
zh: 我今天打算在城里逛逛。

en: Today everyone regards education as a right for all.
zh: 现在大家都觉得受教育是每个人的权利。

en: Many men nowadays seem to have the feeling that in vast modern societies there is nothing of importance that the individual can do.
zh: 现在很多人觉得，在这么庞大的现代社会里，个人能做的事情好像微不足道。

en: Today, many people receive higher education.
zh: 现在的很多人都受过高等教育。

en: Today, one of every seven people in Western Europe is classified as elderly.
zh: 现在西欧每七个人里就有一个是老人。

en: Today there seems to be a tendency to make little of human relations.
zh: 现在的人好像越来越不把人际关系当回事了。

en: We had a quiz today.
zh: 我们今天有个小测验。

en: May I use your car today?
zh: 我今天能借用下你的车吗？

en: Have you a dictionary today?
zh: 你今天带词典了吗？

en: We have a lot of social problems to think about today.
zh: 我们现在有很多社会问题需要思考。

en: Today, I bought ten books in all.
zh: 我今天一共买了十本书。

en: It is difficult to keep abreast of the international situation these days.
zh: 这年头想要紧跟国际局势挺难的。

en: Today, the temperature rose as high as 30 degrees Celsius.
zh: 今天的气温升到了30度。

en: Were you on time for work today?
zh: 你今天上班准时吗？

en: Today we stand at a critical point in history.
zh: 我们现在正处于历史的关键时刻。

en: Today most young people can ski.
zh: 现在的年轻人大多都会滑雪。

en: We have an examination in English today.
zh: 我们今天有英语考试。

en: It's not crowded at all today. This is the least crowded time of all.
zh: 今天一点都不挤，这时候人最少了。

en: I'll bring my sister when I come next time.
zh: 下次来的时候我把我妹也带上。

en: When you come next time, bring your brother.
zh: 你下次来的时候把你兄弟也带上。

en: Come and see us sometime.
zh: 有空过来坐坐。

en: Please mail this letter on your next trip to the post office.
zh: 下次你去邮局的时候，顺便帮我把这封信寄了吧。

en: Please mail this letter the next time you go to the post office.
zh: 你下次去邮局的时候，顺便帮我把这封信寄了吧。

en: Next time you come to see me, I will show you the book.
zh: 下次你来看我的时候，我给你看那本书。

en: Next time you see her, give her my best wishes.
zh: 下次你见到她，替我向她问个好。

en: I don't know when he'll come again.
zh: 我不知道他什么时候会再来。

en: I guess it will be a long time before I can return to Japan.
zh: 我看我得过很久才能再去日本了。

en: Drop in and see us when you're next in Tokyo.
zh: 下次你去东京的时候，记得来找我们玩。

en: Drop in and see us when you're next in Kobe.
zh: 下次你去神户的时候，过来坐坐。

en: We've got some new business coming in and I want to discuss it with you. Do you mind getting involved?
zh: 我们这儿刚接了个新业务，想找你商量一下。你愿意参与吗？

en: Next time I see you, please give me your answer.
zh: 下次见面的时候，记得给我个答复。

en: How about a rain check?
zh: 咱们改天吧？

en: Please drop in to see us next time you come to London.
zh: 下次你来伦敦的时候，一定要来看我们。

en: If you telephone her again, that'll be the last straw!
zh: 你要是再给她打电话，我就彻底忍不了了！

en: This time he has succeeded.
zh: 这回他成功了。

en: Bring your sister next time.
zh: 下次把你妹妹也带上。

en: This time he dressed down, having realized that the smart suit would be out of place.
zh: 这次他穿得很随便，因为他意识到穿西装不太合适。

en: We'll get it this time.
zh: 这一回咱们肯定行。

en: We won't be able to escape punishment this time.
zh: 这回咱们肯定躲不过惩罚了。

en: We won't be able to evade punishment this time.
zh: 这次肯定逃不掉惩罚。

en: We won't be able to avoid being punished this time.
zh: 看来这回免不了要受罚了。

en: I will go there on foot or by bicycle next time.
zh: 下次我要么走路去，要么骑车去。

en: This time it does not fail.
zh: 这回没搞砸。

en: I must return his call.
zh: 我得给他回个电话。

en: I was asked a question in my turn.
zh: 轮到我被提问了。

en: It's my turn to drive next.
zh: 下次该我开车了。

en: Next time it will be my turn to drive.
zh: 下回该轮到我开车了。

en: Now put your hands in your pockets.
zh: 现在把手揣进兜里。

en: I'll let you off this time, but I don't ever want to catch you stealing again.
zh: 这回我就放过你，但要是再让我抓到你偷东西，我绝不客气。

en: Now it's your serve.
zh: 现在该你发球了。

en: This time you must go there.
zh: 这次你必须去。

en: This time, I'll check, double-check and check again.
zh: 这回我得反反复复检查好几遍才行。

en: It is our turn to laugh.
zh: 这回该轮到我们笑了。

en: What are you going to play?
zh: 你打算玩儿什么？

en: I just hope nothing goes wrong this time.
zh: 我就希望这次别出什么岔子。

en: Which side is winning this time?
zh: 这次哪边要赢？

en: She just can't have the nerve to lift it up now!
zh: 她现在肯定没胆量把它拎起来！

en: I'll try not to disappoint you next time.
zh: 下次我尽量不让你失望。

en: I'll try harder next time.
zh: 下次我会更努力的。

en: When will you next visit?
zh: 你下次什么时候来？

en: What is the child up to now?
zh: 那孩子现在又在捣鼓什么呢？

en: This time you should do it by yourself.
zh: 这次你得自己做了。

en: It's your turn to drive.
zh: 该你开车了。

en: It seems that this time I'm the man behind the eight ball.
zh: 看来这回我是遇到大麻烦了。

en: Our next trip is for pleasure, not for work.
zh: 我们下趟旅行是去玩的，不是为了工作。

en: We got to know each other rather well on our recent trip.
zh: 就在前不久的那次旅行里，我们互相了解了不少。

en: The colds that are about at the moment are not serious.
zh: 最近流行的感冒都不太严重。

en: This cold has knocked me for a loop.
zh: 这次感冒可把我折腾惨了。

en: I don't know why it took me so long to get over my cold this time.
zh: 我也不知道这次感冒怎么这么久才好。

en: The new secretary types about 70 words per minute.
zh: 新来的秘书一分钟能打大概70个字。

en: The new secretary doesn't strike me as efficient.
zh: 我觉得新来的秘书办事效率不高。

en: What about next Sunday?
zh: 下周日怎么样？

en: I'll set aside next Sunday for a picnic with my family.
zh: 下周日我要空出时间跟家人去野餐。

en: I leave here at ten-thirty next Sunday.
zh: 我下周日上午十点半从这儿出发。

en: An oratorical contest will be held next Sunday.
zh: 下周日有个演讲比赛。

en: How about going surfing at Hayama next Sunday if it is fine?
zh: 下周日要是天气好的话，去叶山冲浪怎么样？

en: This Sunday let's take a joy ride and see where we end up.
zh: 这周日咱们去兜兜风吧，随缘看能开到哪儿。

en: Remember to go fishing with me this coming Sunday.
zh: 记得这周日跟我去钓鱼。

en: I'm getting married next Sunday.
zh: 我下周日结婚。

en: Have you chosen what to do next Sunday yet?
zh: 你想好下周日干嘛了吗？

en: Have you already decided what to do next Sunday?
zh: 下周日做什么你决定好了吗？

en: Have you decided what to do next Sunday?
zh: 下周日做什么你定了吗？

en: Do you have any previous appointments next Sunday?
zh: 你下周日已经有约了吗？

en: We suggested to her that we should go on a picnic the following Sunday.
zh: 我们建议她下周日一起去野餐。

en: Will you take us for a drive next Sunday?
zh: 你下周日能不能开车带我们去兜风？

en: Please come and see me next Sunday by all means.
zh: 下周日你一定要来找我啊。

en: I will teach you how to skate next Sunday.
zh: 我下周日教你滑冰。

en: We are going to mount a hill near our school this Sunday.
zh: 这周日我们要去爬学校附近的那座山。

en: Won't you come to my house next Sunday?
zh: 下周日你要不要来我家？

en: Can I go hiking next Sunday?
zh: 下周日我能去徒步吗？

en: How about next Saturday?
zh: 下周六怎么样？

en: I'm leaving for Chicago next Saturday morning.
zh: 我下周六早上出发去芝加哥。

en: How about playing tennis next Saturday?
zh: 下周六打网球怎么样？

en: I don't plan to vote at the upcoming election.
zh: 接下来的选举我不打算投票。

en: The sitting government is likely to win in the coming election.
zh: 现任政府很有可能在接下来的选举中获胜。

en: It looks like the party in power will win the upcoming election.
zh: 看来执政党会赢下这次选举。

en: This tax is applied to all private-sector enterprises.
zh: 这项税收适用于所有私企。

en: Next Wednesday will be fine.
zh: 下周三行。

en: Do you have anything next Wednesday?
zh: 你下周三有事吗？

en: I like the new guy. He's not afraid to take on challenging work.
zh: 我挺喜欢那个新人的，他不怕接有挑战性的活儿。

en: George is very enthusiastic about his new job.
zh: 乔治对他这份新工作特别有热情。

en: The new supervisor? He's not very original - pretty much like the rest.
zh: 那个新主管？没什么新意，跟其他人差不多。

en: The new novel added greatly to his reputation.
zh: 那部新小说让他名声大噪。

en: Do you have anything on for this weekend?
zh: 你这周末有安排吗？

en: In our next line of business let's make it our strategy to win by losing.
zh: 咱们接下来的生意就把“以退为进”当策略吧。

en: Will you put us up for the weekend?
zh: 这周末能不能让我们在你那儿借宿一下？

en: The new secretary types faster than the old one.
zh: 新秘书打字比以前那个快。

en: The new mayor is well spoken of by the citizens.
zh: 市民们对新市长的评价挺高的。

en: After the incident I came to have a higher opinion of him.
zh: 那件事之后，我对他的评价变高了。

en: There's less to do in this job than the last one.
zh: 这份工作比上一份清闲。

en: My new job is harder than my old one.
zh: 我这份新工作比以前那个累多了。

en: The next holiday falls on a Sunday.
zh: 下一个假期正好是周日。

en: She will have been in hospital for a month next Monday.
zh: 到下周一，她就住院满一个月了。

en: Next Monday, she'll have been in the hospital for a month.
zh: 下周一她就住院一个月了。

en: To my great relief, her new work of art added to her reputation.
zh: 让我欣慰的是，她的新作品让她更出名了。

en: I will have finished this task by next Friday.
zh: 下周五之前我肯定能把这活儿干完。

en: You must put up with your new post for the present. I'll find you a better place one of these days.
zh: 你先在这个新岗位上凑合一下，过阵子我给你找个更好的地方。

en: This agreement was confirmed by three companies.
zh: 这份协议已经得到了三家公司的确认。

en: Where are you going on your vacation?
zh: 你假期打算去哪儿玩？

en: This holiday isn't much fun - we should have gone home.
zh: 这假休得挺没劲的，咱们早知道还不如回家呢。

en: This holiday isn't much fun - we might as well head back home.
zh: 这假没啥意思，咱们干脆回家吧。

en: Do you like the new school better?
zh: 你觉得新学校更好吗？

en: I'll attend the next meeting.
zh: 下次会议我会参加。

en: You will be able to swim well next summer.
zh: 明年夏天你就能游得很好了。

en: The results for the English exam this time were very good.
zh: 这次英语考试的成绩挺好的。

en: The new picture has made a record breaking hit.
zh: 这部新电影打破了纪录。

en: Will you go on the next bus trip?
zh: 下次的巴士旅行你去吗？

en: The new TV drama is quite interesting.
zh: 这部新出的电视剧挺有意思的。

en: What shall we do on your next days off?
zh: 你下次休假咱们干点啥？

en: What should we do during our next vacation?
zh: 下次放假咱们干什么好呢？

en: What do you want to do for our next holiday?
zh: 下个假期你打算干吗？

en: Prof. K is going to be a major attraction at this event right? I can hardly wait.
zh: K教授是这次活动的大看点吧？我真等不及了。

en: How will you spend the coming three-day holiday?
zh: 接下来的这三天假你打算怎么过？

en: I really must buy that radio next time I am in New York.
zh: 下次去纽约我一定要买那个收音机。

en: I will overlook your lateness this time.
zh: 这次你迟到我就不计较了。

en: I will give him another chance.
zh: 我会再给他一次机会。

en: I don't have anything to do now.
zh: 我现在没什么事。

en: It's a bearish market now.
zh: 现在是熊市。

en: Now the mountain is hidden by the clouds.
zh: 此时山被云雾遮住了。

en: There are a few drops of rain now.
zh: 现在开始落雨点了。

en: I really need a drink now.
zh: 我现在真想喝一杯。

en: It's the hottest season of the year now.
zh: 现在是一年里最热的时候。

en: Well, at this point, it's standing room only.
zh: 哎呀，这会儿只有站位了。

en: You should go back to bed now.
zh: 你现在该回床上睡觉去。

en: I'm not sure right now.
zh: 我现在还不确定。

en: It's very cold now.
zh: 现在天挺冷的。

en: We're a bit busy at the moment. Can you hang on a minute?
zh: 我们这会儿有点忙，能请你等一下吗？

en: I'm not in the least bit happy now.
zh: 我现在一点也高兴不起来。

en: I'm not at all happy now.
zh: 我现在一点都不开心。

en: We don't have time to finish checking the figures now, but we can go over them after lunch.
zh: 我们现在没时间核对完这些数据，午饭后再看吧。

en: He'll become a good husband.
zh: 他以后会是个好丈夫的。

en: I take care of the potatoes now.
zh: 土豆现在由我来管。

en: I have nothing particular to do now.
zh: 我现在没什么特别要忙的事。

en: There is much more water in this lake now than in the past.
zh: 湖里的水比以前多多了。

en: Oysters are in season now.
zh: 现在正是吃生蚝的季节。

en: I don't feel much like talking right now.
zh: 我现在不太想说话。

en: I don't have much time now.
zh: 我现在时间不多。

en: It's three o'clock now; I'll come again in an hour.
zh: 现在三点，我过一个小时再来。

en: Now ten dollars buys less than five dollars did three years ago.
zh: 现在十块钱买到的东西还没三年前五块钱买得多。

en: All I can think about is next month's vacation. I haven't been on one in so long.
zh: 我现在满脑子都是下个月的假，好久没出去玩了。

en: This is an age when honesty does not pay.
zh: 这个时代，老实人吃亏。

en: Why, I've let him win just to please him!
zh: 哎呀，我那是为了哄他高兴才让他赢的！

en: In the current slump, economic growth has fallen to zero percent.
zh: 在目前的萧条期，经济增长已经降到了零。

en: She is not what she used to be ten years ago.
zh: 她已经不是十年前的那个她了。

en: He is quite different from what he was ten years ago.
zh: 他和十年前比简直判若两人。

en: We aren't instilling enough of a volunteer spirit in our young people these days.
zh: 我们现在对年轻人的志愿精神培养得还不够。

en: Did you see that couple in matching outfits just now? How tasteless!
zh: 看到刚才那对穿情侣装的了吗？真土！

en: In getting her present job, she made capital of her father's connections.
zh: 她能找到现在的工作，全靠她父亲的关系。

en: She capitalised on her father's connections in getting her present job.
zh: 她利用她父亲的人脉搞定了现在的工作。

en: The present housing policy is likely to come up against considerable opposition.
zh: 现在的住房政策可能会面临很大的阻力。

en: I'm satisfied with my current income.
zh: 我对我现在的收入挺满意的。

en: What is most necessary for young men today is to develop the habit of thinking for themselves.
zh: 现在的年轻人最需要养成独立思考的习惯。

en: I am not content with what I am.
zh: 我对现在的自己不太满意。

en: Never forget that you owe what you are to your parents.
zh: 别忘了，你能有今天全靠你爸妈。

en: What time is it now?
zh: 现在几点了？

en: I am not the person I used to be.
zh: 我已经不是以前的我了。

en: I am not the man I was when you knew me first.
zh: 我已经不是你当初认识的那个我了。

en: I'm not the same person I was when you first met me.
zh: 我已经不是咱俩刚见面时的那个我了。

en: The money I have now falls short of what I need.
zh: 我现在的钱不够用。

en: My parents have made me what I am today.
zh: 我能有今天，全是我爸妈培养的。

en: The child of today is the man of the future in the making.
zh: 现在的孩子就是未来的主人翁。

en: Kids these days think that any issue in life can be resolved as easily as restarting a computer game.
zh: 现在的孩子觉得生活中的任何问题都能像重启游戏一样解决。

en: I wanna quit my job.
zh: 我想辞职了。

en: I want to quit my current job.
zh: 我想辞了现在这份工作。

en: The work I'm doing now requires originality.
zh: 我现在做的这份工作需要创意。

en: The current king is present at the party.
zh: 现在的国王也参加了这个派对。

en: The current slump of the economy will not turn into a serious depression.
zh: 现在的经济下滑不会演变成严重的萧条。

en: If these tendencies continue, those aged 65 or more will account for a quarter of the population within 30 years.
zh: 照这么下去，30年内65岁以上的人口会占到四分之一。

en: Can't you get by on your salary?
zh: 靠你那点工资过不下去吗？

en: If students today had more free time, they might show more interest in politics.
zh: 如果现在的学生空闲时间多一点，可能会对政治更感兴趣。

en: Our current house is too small, so we decided to move.
zh: 我们现在的房子太小了，所以决定搬家。

en: Our present house is too small, so we decided to move.
zh: 我们现在的房子太小了，所以决定搬家。

en: Only hope can keep me together now.
zh: 现在只有希望才能支撑我活下去。

en: He is a good doctor, as doctors go these days.
zh: 在现在的医生里，他算是个不错的医生了。

en: Can you repeat what you said?
zh: 你能再说一遍吗？

en: At the moment, I have no plans to travel.
zh: 目前我还没有出游的计划。

en: We've really hit it off.
zh: 我们真的很投缘。

en: I can't remember for the moment.
zh: 我这会儿想不起来了。

en: At the moment they think that the accident is due to his carelessness.
zh: 目前他们认为事故是由于他的疏忽造成的。

en: Right now I want for nothing.
zh: 我现在什么都不缺。

en: I've managed to finish the first three chapters so far.
zh: 到目前为止，我已经完成了前三章。

en: As yet, I have not completed the sweater.
zh: 到现在为止，我还没织完那件毛衣。

en: That's enough for now.
zh: 先这些吧。

en: I am prepared to put up with it for the time being.
zh: 我准备先忍一忍。

en: I have nothing to do at the moment.
zh: 我现在没什么事儿干。

en: For the time being, I will wait for the result of the survey.
zh: 我打算先等调查结果出来再说。

en: I can not say anything for the moment.
zh: 我这会儿什么也说不准。

en: I can't say anything now.
zh: 我现在什么都不能说。

en: This will do for now.
zh: 暂时这样就行。

en: We haven't been able to handle this so far.
zh: 到目前为止，我们还没法处理这件事。

en: The only one we have is this one here.
zh: 我们手头只有这一个。

en: I don't need money at present.
zh: 我现在不需要钱。

en: The engine has given us no trouble as yet.
zh: 这个发动机目前还没出过什么毛病。

en: You have been doing well at school so far.
zh: 目前为止你在学校表现得挺好。

en: At present, consensus has yet to be reached.
zh: 目前还没有达成共识。

en: Our prospects for victory are excellent at the moment.
zh: 目前看来我们的赢面很大。

en: Presently the plan is still in the air.
zh: 目前这个计划还没定下来。

en: Everything is going well at present.
zh: 现在一切进展顺利。

en: Make hay!
zh: 趁热打铁！

en: Do it when you have time.
zh: 等你有空了再做吧。
